text: Ya 'Ayyuha Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Tubu 'Ila Allahi Tawbatan Nasuhaan `Asa Rabbukum 'An Yukaffira `Ankum Sayyi'atikum Wa Yudkhilakum Jannatin Tajri Min Tahtiha Al-'Anharu Yawma La Yukhzi Allahu An-Nabiya Wa Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Ma`ahu Nuruhum Yas`a Bayna 'Aydihim Wa Bi'aymanihim Yaquluna Rabbana 'Atmim Lana Nurana Wa Aghfir Lana 'Innaka `Ala Kulli Shay'in Qadirun
